entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Faster Math.Max/Min for x64 #65625
    Future
  • "runtime-libraries enterprise-linux" jobs failing due to network issue #65621
  • Regression of Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection with Unity and WebGL #65620
  • [API Proposal]: Add `DeleteFromJsonAsync` for `HttpClient` #65617
  • Recent NativeAOT produce warnings about invalid format of DLL #65613
  • NativeAOT scanner failure #65612
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryStreamExtensions #65610
  • Add tests for List<T> mutations in Exists, FindAll, TrueForAll #65608
    Future
  • RegexOptions.NonBacktracking isn't always matching semantics of backtracking engines #65607
    7.0.0
  • RegexOptions.NonBacktracking needs to handle capture groups when startat == input.Length #65606
    7.0.0
  • Add RegexGenerator perf tests #65605
    7.0.0

Closed

  • R2R ignores AdvSimd on ARM64 #65587
    7.0.0
  • Support more than one jsoncontext in aspnet core #63171
  • UseNativeHttpHandler=true is not trimming correctly on mobile apps #64361
    6.0.x
  • Samplers should be allowed to modify tracestate #63652
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Tracking issue for issues caused by the emscripten bump to 2.0.34 #65464

PullRequests

Created

  • Cleanup platform-specific ifdefs #65624
  • Only register composite R2R native image code range once #65623
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Enable AddrMode for GC types on arm64 #65622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix liveness for dead non-removable partial definitions #65618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add back StructWithPublicDefaultConstructor test #65616
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Added tests for changing a list size being iterated on (#65608) #65615
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Define SystemReflectionMetadataLoadContextVersion property for package references #65614
    area-Build-mono
  • Add basic NTLM fake server to test NTAuthentication round-trip scenarios #65611
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: revise approach for x64 OSR epilogs #65609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow to run tests for internal AzDo PRs #65603
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Faster Math.Max/Min on arm64 #65584
    area-System.Numerics
  • Propagate native references to merged project wrapper outputs #65592
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Don't mark prefldinit4 as requiring process isolation #65596
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix HelperMethodFrame::UpdateRegDisplay on x86 #65589
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove ExactSpelling from GeneratedDllImport #65343
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Allow Trace Samplers to Modify the Activity Trace State #65530
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Trigger all wasm jobs, if `eng/Version.Details.xml` has any chan… #65451
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Suppress some new trimmer warnings #65580
    linkable-framework
  • Remove S.R.CS.Unsafe and Intrinsify Unsafe #64861
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unroll Equals and StartsWith for constant strings and spans. [0..32] chars #65288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Auto-update `src/libraries` solutions #65595
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add a transport package with libmono-profiler-aot.so on Android #65401
    area-Build-mono
  • Create snapcraft.yaml for 7.0 #65525
    area-Snap
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Roll out automated issue cleanup #65576
    area-Meta
  • Fix Queryable-to-Enumerable overload mapping logic #65569
    area-System.Linq, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump sdk for workload testing to `7.0.100-preview.2.22108.4` #65003
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix Type.IsPublic for pointer and byref types #65156
    area-System.Reflection
  • Adding Regex.IsMatch(Span) and RegexRunner.Scan() methods #65473
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Change regex source generator to emit returns rather than jumps to NoMatch #65599
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [MonoAPI] Split type and function headers, add MONO_API_FUNCTION macro #65446
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [No Review] Trying Server 2022 in main pipeline #65236
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • More clean up for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #65479
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Update GeneratedDllImportAttribute CharSet -> StringMarshalling #65544
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • After install 6.0 GA arm64 SDK on Mac OS Monterey(12.0.1) Parallels VM on M1 machine, use ` dotnet --info ` met error "Unhandled exception." #22978
  • Resolve package references to projects #1151
  • [Preview] Unable to restore packages from feeds with encrypted passwords on windows #23498
  • .NET Core SDK 6.0.200: Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis, Version=4.1.0.0' #23972
  • Workload feature band fallback doesn't work with workload update #23403
    6.0.3xx
  • Workload feature band fallback doesn't work with rollback files #23402
    6.0.3xx
  • `%(TargetingPack.PackageDirectory)` blank when installed via .msi? #23562
    Discussion
  • Running dotnet run on a console app has no output #23616
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • [WorkloadInstall] Simplify code workload install command line #24028

Updated

  • Add artifacts post processing #24012
    Area-DotNet Test

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Fix the bug of escape code inside regex keep causing ide to crash #59249
    Backlog
  • Behavior changed for [CallerArgumentExpression] in constructor for [InterpolatedStringHandler] for the receiver parameter #59661
    17.2
  • Investigate why „ ” in Polish translations doesn't show correctlly #58994
  • Ctrl+Left/Right Arrow inside raw string literals does not behave as expected #59581
    17.2
  • Interpolated raw string literals don't handle double braces correctly #59603
    17.2
  • AliasSymbol.Equals throw NullReferenceException when comparing two global symbols #58999
    17.2

Updated

  • Roslyn crashes when compiling with NoStdLib flag #58942
    Backlog
  • `<exception>` tag does not limit available `cref` symbols to exceptions #59257
    Backlog
  • Typing <enter> in single-line raw string literal should convert it to multiline. #59347
    17.2
  • "Convert to switch statement" refactoring generates invalid code #59616
  • Editor doesn't render documentation comments properly #58966
    17.2
  • Visual Studio 17.1 brown error messages when Source Generator triggered while generated files are open #59633
  • Disabled including binaries for generators in latest .net sdk preview #59209
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Add build step to generate SBOM #59663
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle binary files in AdditionalTextComparer.GetHashCode #59660
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators

Merged

  • Fix text structure navigation for raw strings. #59656
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix issue with curlies being innapropriately unescaped in raw string literals. #59607
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Move GenerateOverridesOptions and BlockStructureOptions to global options #59508
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Propagate CodeActionOptions through fix all #59575
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59659
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix null-ref in `AliasSymbol.Equals` #59649
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59668
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #59667
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #59666
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #59665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add external access APIs for O# #59469
    Area-IDE
  • Diagnostic incremental analyzer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • Global ide analyzer options #59657
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options - take 2 #59233
    Area-IDE
  • SyntaxWrappingOptions #59604
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Allow exception local to be used in filter prologue in async methods #59608
    Area-Compilers
  • Use BatchFixer to fix all for naming violation #59452
    Area-IDE
  • Review feedback from #59510 #59600
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Additional tests for lambda attributes, explicit return type, and inferred delegate type #59634
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Feature - Lambda Improvements

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Custom Elements not rendering as/when expected #40318
  • staticwebassets.runtime.json also includes files from referenced RCL NuGet package #40317
  • [NativeAOT] - IL trimming warnings. #40315
  • blazor wasm using new Claim("roles", role) cause @attribute [Authorize(Roles = "admin")] not work #40314
  • API1000 analyser should recognise annotations in XML docs #40312
  • Similar to MarkupString but for custom components. #40311

Closed

  • Unhandled exception rendering component: The provided expression contains a PropertyExpression which is not supported. FieldIdentifier only supports simple member accessors (fields, properties) of an object #39906
    5.0.x
  • Dynamic routing #40265
  • Blazor documentation needs additional real usage examples for settings #40288
  • Issue running BlazorWebAssemblyCustomInitialization sample #40195
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Razor in CSS preprocessor support #40281
  • Why BadHttpRequest is logged twice (as INFO and ERROR) #39907
    7.0-preview3
  • .NET 6 RC2 Blazor with server side rendering and Azure B2C #37713
    Discussions
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-43877 | ASP.NET Core Elevation of privilege Vulnerability #39028
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a switch to defer rendering of components in ComponentTagHelper #40316
  • Only enable trailers/reset/goaway on OSs that support them #40310
    area-runtime
  • Add aspnet-build ownership of Version files #40309

Merged

  • Bump Polly to 7.2.3 #40284
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Log IIS BadHttpRequestExceptions at debug level #40002
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Use PackageConflictPreferredPackages for analyzers from transport package #40216
    area-infrastructure
  • Use LoggerMessageAttribute in more places #40297
    area-runtime
  • Use WixBundleName instead of WixBundle #40305
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Resolve Component Governance bugs #40218
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.16

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Desktop Dialogs for MAUI Desktop Apps #4795
  • [iOS] Keyboard covers the entry #4792

Closed

  • Can MAUI.Essential be used/consumed in RCL Project ? #4779

PullRequests

Merged

  • Implement Cookies property in WebView #4419
    area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Implement IsFocused property and Focus(), Unfocus() methods #4562
    platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y

Updated

  • Essentials.WebAuthenticator refactored to interface and singleton #4757
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Implement LineBreakMode property in ButtonHandler #4664
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653
    area/controls 🎮
  • Blazor Android/Windows Open Links in Browser with Configurability #4645
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [templates] add global.json to pin to .NET 6 #4767
    area/templates 📄
  • Add single target build ProjectCapability #4791
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0.300-preview.14

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Writing from an overriden property causes unexpected behavior. #27476
  • Run the string resources T4 files on build #27475
  • Consider setting NullabilityInfoContextSupport=true in EF's NuGet package #27474

Closed

  • Use INSERT w/OUTPUT Instead of INSERT+SELECT #7188
